item.title: Object teleporting issues
item.dc:creator: @MikeX MikeX
item.description:
@MikeX wrote:

[quote=“bloodymouth, post:3, topic:180116”]dude i have this same problem. pisses me off.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 01:09:24 AM[/size][hr]To fix it add the object to your object.cfg.

object = ID	XXXX	YYYY	1

for example

object = 2478	2843	4833	1

That is the object id then object coordinate X then cooridinate Y.[/quote]

LEECHOR!

item.title: Object teleporting issues
item.dc:creator: @bloodymouth bloodymouth
item.description:
@bloodymouth wrote:

dude i have this same problem. pisses me off.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 01:09:24 AM[/size][hr]To fix it add the object to your object.cfg.

object = ID	XXXX	YYYY	1

for example

object = 2478	2843	4833	1

That is the object id then object coordinate X then cooridinate Y.

(credits to Rich for this)

Read full topic

item.title: Object teleporting issues

item.description:

note it is a portal and i have already spawned it in newobjects method

case 2469: { teleportToX = 2660; teleportToY = 3305; sendMessage("test confirmed"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
wtf is wrong with it?
